author: Caleb Prater

changelog.release_notes: A simple watchface to view the time and date and keep your health goals central to help you stay on track! The central circle shows your progress to meeting your goal steps for the day automatically calculated based on your previous averages! The current hour is highlighted blue and the blue dot marks the minutes. Custom colors and goals coming soon!!
